| Date |  |  | |

**POSITION OVERVIEW**

The Team Leader – Pouch Making & Slitting Machines oversees the operation of pouch-making and slitting machines, ensuring optimal productivity, efficiency, and compliance with company policies in the Production Department.

This role includes supervising packers and operators, managing daily production activities, and ensuring adherence to BRCGS standards, quality control measures, and safety protocols. The incumbent will also act as deputy to the Production Manager in their absence and perform tasks as required on the production floor.

The Team Leader is expected to be hands-on, capable of performing machine operation, packing, reworking, sorting, and inspecting while maintaining full accountability for subordinates.

**PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES**

**GENERAL MANAGEMENT & COMPLIANCE**

1. Oversee and manage the safe and efficient operation of pouch-making and slitting machines.
2. Ensure full compliance with BRCGS requirements and the Product Safety and Quality Management System.
3. Enforce and uphold Occupational Health and Safety Act (OHS Act) regulations in all work areas.
4. Identify workplace hazards and implement corrective actions as required.
5. Drive a culture of accountability, teamwork, and operational excellence.
6. Participate in production meetings to provide insights into machine performance, challenges, and areas for improvement.
7. Assist in standardising factory floor procedures for consistency and efficiency.

**MACHINE OPERATION & MAINTENANCE**

* **Set up, operate, and maintain** pouch-making and slitting machines in a **safe and efficient** manner.
* Conduct **routine maintenance** according to machine maintenance schedules.
* Work with **Maintenance Technicians** to report and resolve machine breakdowns.
* Perform **cleaning and sanitation** tasks in compliance with cleaning schedules.
* Verify machine settings against **Job Card specifications**, addressing discrepancies immediately.
* Conduct **incoming material inspections** to ensure compliance with production standards.

**DOCUMENTATION & INSPECTION**

* Complete all required **documentation** related to **product safety and quality**.
* Ensure accurate **shift handover reports** for smooth operational continuity.
* Maintain proper records for **material handling, traceability, and stock movement**.
* Assist in generating **production reports** as required.

**PRODUCTION & WASTE CONTROL**

* Monitor and **optimise machine performance** to reduce downtime.
* Ensure **timely and accurate** logging of **production data**.
* Supervise the **packing process** to ensure compliance with **quality specifications**.
* Implement **waste management processes**, including accurate **weighing, recording, and segregation**.
* Verify **manual counting accuracy** using counting scales.
* Ensure seamless **integration of production processes** with warehousing and slitting operations.

**LEADERSHIP & TEAM SUPERVISION**

* Supervise **packers and operators**, ensuring adherence to production schedules.
* Foster a **positive work environment** with clear expectations and **proactive problem-solving**.
* Address **operational challenges** promptly and implement **corrective measures**.
* Maintain **consistent communication** with supervisors regarding production progress, staffing, and shift issues.
* Organise **shift schedules** to ensure optimal skill allocation.
* Identify **training needs** and oversee staff skill development.
* Report **non-conformities**, including defects, maintenance issues, and foreign objects.

**CUSTOMER COMPLAINT INVESTIGATION & RESOLUTION**

* Conduct investigations into **customer complaints**, ensuring timely and effective resolution.
* Review all relevant details and document findings properly.
* Work with the **Quality and Production Teams** to identify root causes and implement corrective actions.
* Facilitate **preventive measures** to avoid repeat complaints.

**NON-CONFORMANCE & CORRECTIVE ACTION**

* Identify and report **material issues**, filing **Non-Conformance Alerts (NCAs)** where necessary.
* Ensure proper handling of **non-conforming materials**, including **documentation, segregation, correction, and labelling**.
* Assist in **risk assessments** and implementation of corrective actions.

**TOOL & EQUIPMENT MANAGEMENT**

* Ensure **proper storage and security** of tools, measuring devices, and other equipment.
* Conduct **regular inspections** to maintain equipment **readiness and safety standards**.
* Report and track **maintenance requirements** for efficient issue resolution.
* Ensure effective management of **spare parts and inventory**.

**CONDUCT EXPECTATIONS**

* Be **available for communication** at all times during working hours.
* Maintain a **functioning telephone** for consistent responsiveness.
* Respond promptly to **emails, text messages, and WhatsApp communications**.
* Uphold **professional and respectful communication** at all times.
* Follow scheduled **break times** to maintain workflow efficiency.
* Ensure **compliance with job card instructions** and obtain proper authorisation for deviations.
* Ensure compliance with **sample collection and storage policies**.

**TRAINING & DEVELOPMENT**

* Ensure that work is performed by **trained and competent personnel**.
* Participate in **hands-on training sessions** for machine operation and maintenance.
* Establish **clear performance expectations** for machine operators.

**REQUIRED SKILLS & QUALIFICATIONS**

* **Senior National Certificate** or equivalent qualification.
* Experience in a **manufacturing environment** is advantageous.
* Strong **mechanical aptitude** with troubleshooting skills.
* Effective **organisational and time-management** skills.
* Ability to work **independently** and demonstrate **initiative**.
* Strong **leadership and supervisory** skills.
* Proficiency in **production reporting tools and MS Office** is beneficial.

**COMPLIANCE & LEGAL OBLIGATIONS**

* Ensure adherence to the **Occupational Health and Safety Act (OHS Act)**.
* Uphold all regulations in accordance with the **Basic Conditions of Employment Act (BCEA)**.
* Enforce compliance with **Kangopak’s Disciplinary Code and Procedures**.
* Maintain full compliance with **BRCGS standards and food safety requirements**.

**PERFORMANCE METRICS & EXPECTATIONS**

* Maintain consistent and efficient **machine operation** with minimal downtime.
* Ensure **full compliance** with **quality and safety standards**.
* Promote **professionalism, attendance, and adherence to company policies**.
* Identify and resolve **operational inefficiencies** promptly.
* Maintain a **structured, compliant, and efficient** work environment.
* Support **continuous improvement initiatives** to **optimise production efficiency** and **reduce waste**.
